messages.content: Hello! I'm an AI language model, so I don't have feelings or emotions. How can I assist you today?

As an AI language model, I don't have feelings or emotions, so I don't experience wellness or unwellness. I am a computer program designed to process and analyze information, and I am always functioning at 100%. How can I assist you today?
Then why did you say that you're feeling well?

I apologize for any confusion, as an AI language model I don't have feelings or emotions, and I don't experience wellness or unwellness. I am a computer program designed to process and analyze information, and I use language to communicate with you. My statement "I'm feeling well" was a pre-programmed response to acknowledge your question and to confirm my functioning. How can I assist you today?
So you don't feel well when I don't ask you questions?

As an AI language model, I don't have feelings or emotions, so I don't experience wellness or unwellness. I am a computer program designed to process and analyze information, and I don't have consciousness or feelings. I am here to assist you with any questions or tasks you might have to the best of my abilities, and I am always functioning at 100%. How can I assist you today?
